question1.question: Is SimplePDFConvert free?
question1.answer: Yes! We offer a free tier with generous limits. You can try all our tools without a credit card.

question2.question: How secure are my files?
question2.answer: Very secure. All files are encrypted during upload and processing. We automatically delete your files from our servers after 1 hour.

question3.question: Do conversions keep formatting?
question3.answer: Yes! Our conversion tools preserve the original formatting, fonts, images, and layout as much as possible.

question4.question: Can I merge multiple PDFs at once?
question4.answer: Absolutely! Our Merge PDF tool lets you combine as many PDF files as you need into a single document.
